text: Quick Sequential Organ Failure Analysis (qQSOFA) scoreÂ® qSOFA criteria: 2 2 of the following Respiratory rate >22/min Change in mental status Systolic blood pressure <100 mmHg * Adapted from: Singer M, Deutschman CS, Seymour CW et al. The Third Intemational Consensus Definitions for Sepsis and Septic Shock (Sepsis- 3)JAMA2016; 315 (8):801-810.
